phrases: Want to commit double suicide with me?
Just kidding...
I just thought I would say it.
You see, I...
Are you going to forget?
Kousei, do you feel sick or something?
I am okay.
I am asking because you do not look okay.
Why do not we go visit Kao-chan?
We have not been able to go together lately.
It is been a while, let us go!
Hey, good idea.
I am not going.
Did he have a fight with Kao-chan, maybe?
You okay with that?
Saying such a thing...
What thing?
Like rubbing salt into your enemy's wounds.
Enemy?
If he is having issues over music, then I do not know how to help him.
I just think that Kousei will cheer up if he sees Kao-chan, so...
Well, I do not think it will kill you to dial it up a little.
For whose sake are you studying against your will?
For whose sake did you choose a higher-ranked high school?
Choosing a high school near Okutsu Music College Affiliated High...
Who would you do that for?
Oh!
W-Well, you know!
Kousei's totally helpless on his own, so...
If only you would be that honest and tell him that yourself.
The truth is, I wish he would not go at all.
It makes me feel anxious, and I get frustrated.
I feel like being snarky to him, too...
When he said he was not going,
I know I felt relieved.
And full of guilt.
And since I do not want him to see me like that, I am doing my darnedest to put on an act.
Have I always been so horrible?
I am discovering all these different sides of myself that I never knew I had...
Facing all these different sides of me.
I guess that is also...
What you call...
Your head is miles away.
Let us call it a day.
Go on home.
I am sorry.
Oh!
Um, Seto-sensei, I have an emergency!
Sorry!
I am counting on you, okay?
Totsuhara University Hospital - 890m
Huh?
Arima-sensei?
I was able to catch up to you just walking at a normal pace.
You walk too slow.
Your posture's terrible!
You need to get a grip, or you will look like a slob!
May your dreams come true!
So this Kimoto dude, he goes, I will play my oboe for you at the culture festival, Nagi-kun.
How deluded is that?
But would not that be pretty thrilling?
Depends on who.
Comes down to... probably their face.
You are such a realist!
Finally got you to laugh!
Thanks.
Sorry to make you worry.
N-N-N-Not at all!
Worry about you?
Are you crazy?
It would be a bore to have a wuss for an enemy, that is all.
That guy, he is unbelievable, you know.
Everyone is freaked out because he is got the whole score memorized perfectly,
but he does not even bat an eyelash.
What is he, a gunman out of a Western?
Sounds like a die-cast robot with that heart of steel, huh?
Like a hero, right?
Dammit!
What am I... supposed to tell him?
Good luck...
Do not let him beat you...
How irresponsible is that?
Kousei Arima Sumitani Junior Highschool
So...
Instead of thanking him, my selfish way of compensating for being so powerless...
I am an ugly phantom.
Kimoto-kun's going to be a great performer, you know.
What?
You think so?
It is more important than you would think, playing for someone else.
What are you going to play the piano for?
For someone else's sake?
You said you started playing the piano for someone else, right?
That is when you are able to play well.
When you have shared those sounds with tons of people,
when you have reached tons of people with those sounds,
when your hearts come together...
It might be that music transcends words.
That is just a cliche.
Women are realistic.
We only believe in words.
May your dreams come true!
Ravel...
I do not want to hear it!
I do not want to hear it!
I do not want to hear Ravel!
Commit double suicide with me.
I do not want to hear it.
I do not want to think about anything!
I wish I could just stop hearing everything!
Music Preparation Room
Yo.
We are on our way to visit my Kaori-chan in the hospital.
Come with us.
I am going to pass on that.
No need to hold back because of us.
Come on, let us go.
I said I am not going!
What is wrong with you?
Listen, you... do not you think you are being callous?
After Kaori-chan did so much for you, why are you running away?
Look at me!
H-Hey... Kousei...
Watari...
What am I supposed to do?
You see, I...
It does not look good for me.
It is not true.
It is not true.
I am so sorry.
I guess maybe we never should have met, huh?
I could not say a word.
What could I have said to her?
How should I act when I see her?
Listen, Kousei.
This is just my opinion, but...
I think you should go see Kaori-chan after all.
Sure, if she was okay with me, I would do anything in the world.
If it was for a girl I liked, I would even drink muddy water, just slurp-slurp-slurp, you know?
But you know what, I think for Kaori-chan, I am not the one, you know?
When she wants her own way or needs to lean on somebody...
Whenever she wants somebody to do something for her,
it is you she always turns to, Kousei.
Enter a competition!
Be my accompanist!
I wish I could have a canele.
Please support me in this moment that I am about to lose heart.
But I just do not know what to say to her.
Do not sweat it... you will know once you are there.
A man can only take action!
But for me, it is impossible.
Whether or not it is impossible,
the girl will let you know.
I did not think you would ever come again.
Because I promised to bring you some caneles.
Have you been practicing the piano?
Yeah.
How is school?
The same as usual.
How is everybody doing?
So-so.
What kind of answers are those?
You do not even want to be here, do you?
Yes I do!
I do, but I do not know what to say, that is all.
Just go back to the way things were before.
You can just forget about it all, like you have pressed the reset button.
Tap, tap, tap... like that.
Why would you...
I will not forget.
And that will make your heart lighter.
There is no point in remembering, anyway.
A violinist who cannot hold her own bow... that is pointless.
Why would... why would you say such a thing?
After all that howling, slapping me around,
forcing me up onstage against my will...
After carving so many scenes into my mind that I do not want to forget...
That is my canele!
Like I would let such a cranky whiner have it?
I would feel sorry for the canele!
But I am the one who asked for it!
I am the one who bought it!
What is that?
That is that!
Not again...
You are irresponsible!
I wash my hands of you!
Wait
You really are a weird one.
I feel so bitter... so bitter...
And it is just so sad.
You gave me so many things...
Is not there anything I can do for you?
If it was for a girl I liked, I would even drink muddy water.
I want him to notice... that I am here... with my playing.
I drew this...
Whaaat?
You want to perform at the culture festival?
A bolt out of the blue?
I do not get it!
What are you thinking?
You are really pushing it.
Please!
Fine.
No way!
But it is your big moment.
What am I going to do?
Are you really sure?
I only asked because I had nothing to lose.
Grovel some more, Kousei Arima!
I do not really know where this is coming from,
but since I was struggling to come up with a program...
and I think it will be intriguing...
Thanks.
Arima-sensei... why do you want to perform at the culture festival?
Hey, there, my princess.
Want To discuss
The Knight of the Rose with us?
We reserved a booth at a diner for you.
Nagi, let us have a crepe on the way home.
Cannot do it.
You have a date?
Make it sound more springy.
Use your wrists to play softly.
Maybe you should wait an extra beat.
Speed up the intro and vary the pace.
No way!
How many times did you go over it?
It is even more accurate than yesterday.
You are not eating?
No.
I am not really hungry.
I am going to go practice.
She is pushing herself too hard, do not you think?
I made a mistake!
I am sorry!
Do not worry about misplaying the notes sometimes.
Let us hear you play it through.
I am sorry, I am sorry, I am sorry...
Good luck!
We will be there, no matter what!
You are this year's main draw!
Ibata-sensei will be in the audience.
So turn in a perfect performance.
If he acknowledges your talent, you will be set for life!
I hear they are sending a reporter.
They are doing a feature on a beautiful young female pianist.
Four more days.
I am looking forward to this.
Four more days.
I only have four more days to make this piece my own.
We have high hopes for you!
She gets extra points for her looks, do not you think?
The magazine writer's coming just to see Nagi.
She will own everyone else without even trying.
Lolicon bait!
Your parents must be so proud.
Good luck!
She is nothing but a pretty face.
I have got to endure this suffering for another four days?
Hey!
Nagi!
Help me, Mom...
My hearing...
Once again, I am a failure as an instructor.
I am about to let history repeat itself.
Nagi...
I am afraid.
Even though it is just a school event...
even though it is not an important competition.
We are all afraid.
Even me, even Kousei...
And I am sure even Takeshi Aiza-kun...
Your whole life is condensed into a scant few minutes onstage.
Sure it is scary, and it makes no sense, either.
Then why are you still a pianist, Seto-sensei?
Once you get past that, there is a moment when the slate gets wiped clean.
All the months of agony, screaming, suffering, and struggling...
There is a moment when you are rewarded for all that.
When you have reached tons of people with those sounds,
when your hearts come together... music just might transcend words.
Maybe we are creatures who just cannot help ourselves... possessed by that moment.
It is a little like being in love.
We...
Gotcha!
Do not monopolize the bathroom!
I give up!
Koharu, at least take the left leg!
Your place is not here in the bathroom.
You are afraid to go out onstage because you practiced so hard.
You gave your body and soul to the piano, and that is why you are afraid to expose them.
If anyone calls you a mentally unprepared coward, I will kill them myself.
Throw out that non-existent chest of yours.
You are Kousei Arima's apprentice!
No, I am not!
He is my enemy!
That is the spirit!
Now let us settle this once and for all, onstage...
Watari?
Huh?
I want you to do something for me.
Sure.
But I have not told you anything yet.
If it is you who is asking,
it is cool.
Kurumi School Festival
Kuru School Festival
This is the scent of pure, musical maidens!
The place is packed with cute girls!
Woo hoo!
You are like a walking hard-on.
Hey!
This way, right?
Looks like it is already started.
Too bad they are plodding along like that when they have got those costumes on.
That is what makes them cute.
Nagi-chan will be up soon, right?
How did that turn out?
Who knows?
She would not even tell me a thing about it.
Could it be that she is outgrown her big brother complex?
Must be sad for you, Big Bro!
Nah, it is a relief.
Good job, Komugi!
I think I did a good job!
Huh?
Where is Nagi?
Namahage?
Bad kids will...
They are getting huge laughs?
That is going to make a serious act like ours stick out like a sore thumb!
This school festival is a terrifying event!
Are you okay?
O-O-O-Of course I am okay, why would not I be?
You are quite calm yourself, Arima-sensei!
Lose your head more!
I am so overwhelmed, I do not have time to be nervous, I guess...
That is right.
The first time I met you, your hand was trembling, too.
What do you think you are doing, you pervert?
You sexual harasser!
If you squeeze my hand so hard, your fingers will lock up.
Now open up your hand... and relax...
We are all afraid.
Even me, even Kousei...
Were you driven into a corner, too?
Are you afraid, too?
The same way...
I am?
A friend of mine told me once.
Just play with sincerity, give the performance of your life with everything you have got.
But...
I have only lived for thirteen years.
Even if it is only been thirteen years... for you,
and for everyone who is watched you till now,
it is thirteen years that cannot be replaced.
Let us believe in it, the time you have devoted to music.
Performer No. 8,
please take the stage.
That is us...
All right, let us go!
Right.
Twilight
Episode 18
